rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, create a Campsite attached to a land you control. [i](It's a Fortification artifact token with “Fortify {2}.”)[/i] Invoke X, where X is the number of modified permanents you control. [i](Remove X -1/-1 counters from an Avatar you control. If you don't control an Avatar, create a 20/20 Avatar creature token with nineteen -1/-1 counters first. Attached permanents you control and counters are modifications.)[/i]
